TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntryWrittenEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor. It creates a custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object and writes an entry into it. Then it creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs> object using the first entry in the custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>. This object is used to notify a message.
[!code-cpp[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1/CPP/entrywritteneventargs_ctor1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1/CS/entrywritteneventargs_ctor1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor1/VB/entrywritteneventargs_ctor1.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor. It creates a custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object and writes an entry into it. Then it creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs> object using the first entry in the custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>. This object is used to notify a message.

Docs.summary: Gets the event log entry that was written to the log.
Docs.value: An that represents the entry that was written to the event log.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example assumes that you have already implemented the sample in <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry%29>.
It creates a custom <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> object and writes an entry into it. Then it creates an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EntryWrittenEventArgs> object using the first entry in the custom EventLog. This object is used to notify a message.
[!code-cpp[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2/CPP/entrywritteneventargs_ctor2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2/CS/entrywritteneventargs_ctor2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EntryWrittenEventArgs_ctor2/VB/entrywritteneventargs_ctor2.vb#2)]
